content.rendered:
Who are We?

Dexit is built by a decentralized team of contributors from all over the world. We don’t believe in traditional companies, hierarchy, and management. Anyone is welcome to contribute code, ideas, or anything else that can help make our vision a reality!

Learn more

Our Vision

We envision an open, borderless world. A world in which people and machines collaborate and exchange value globally and freely, without gatekeepers or intermediaries. A world in which communities thrive, unconstrained by artificial borders and archaic regulations. We will strive to empower everyone to effortlessly join this new, better world.

Start now
What we do

We are blockchain integrators

Through the EVM, developers can utilize smart contracts on top of Dexit chain, and it allows projects to port their existing Ethereum dApps over to Dexit easily.
Addtionally, Dexit chain is designed to incentivize smart contract developers by offering up to 45% gas fees on the protocol level.  it is one of the rare blockchain that offer for developer as inventive.

October-December 2022
Dexit mainnet Launched DeFi platform created
